document_title: Otosclerosis: Causes, signs, complications, treatment, prevention
subsection_content:
The first step in diagnosis is to rule out other diseases or health problems that can cause otosclerosis-like symptoms.
Next steps include hearing tests to measure hearing sensitivity (audiogram) and sound conduction in the middle ear (tympanogram).
Sometimes, diagnostic imaging, such as a CT scan, is also used to identify otosclerosis.(3)
subsection_title: benh xop xo tai.json. Diagnosis method of otosclerosis

benh xop xo tai.json. Diagnosis method of otosclerosis
The first step in diagnosis is to rule out other diseases or health problems that can cause otosclerosis-like symptoms.
Next steps include hearing tests to measure hearing sensitivity (audiogram) and sound conduction in the middle ear (tympanogram).
Sometimes, diagnostic imaging, such as a CT scan, is also used to identify otosclerosis.(3)
